headline: “Paramount (PSKY) Has a War Chest,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 14 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Paramount Skydance Corporation (NASDAQ:PSKY) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. Paramount Skydance Corporation (NASDAQ:PSKY) is another stock that Jim Cramer frequently discusses due to the firm’s takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery. headline: Netflix's Greg Peters Says Paramount's Warner Bros Bid Has No Chance Without Larry Ellison, Calls Debt Plan 'Pretty Crazy'
summary: Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) co-CEO Greg Peters said Paramount Skydance's (NASDAQ:PSKY) $108 billion hostile bid for Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ:WBD) is unrealistic without Oracle Corp (NYSE:ORCL) founder Larry Ellison's financial backing. Netflix Dismisses Paramount's Debt-Fueled Offer Netflix co-chief executive Greg Peters sharply criticized Paramount's rival bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, saying the offer "doesn't pass the sniff test" and would collapse without Ellison's personal support. I
